mapper.sql: fid, fusername, fpassword, flastpassword_reset_date AS flastpasswordResetDate, fenabled, femail, flastname, ffirstname, fcreator, fcreate_time AS fcreateTime, fupdator, fupdate_time AS fupdateTime, fis_delete AS fisDelete, fext

${alias}.fid as fid ,${alias}.fusername as fusername ,${alias}.fpassword as fpassword ,${alias}.flastpassword_reset_date as flastpasswordResetDate ,${alias}.fenabled as fenabled ,${alias}.femail as femail ,${alias}.flastname as flastname ,${alias}.ffirstname as ffirstname ,${alias}.fcreator as fcreator ,${alias}.fcreate_time as fcreateTime ,${alias}.fupdator as fupdator ,${alias}.fupdate_time as fupdateTime ,${alias}.fis_delete as fisDelete ,${alias}.fext as fext
